TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VisualStateManager extends System.Windows.DependencyObject

summary.span: 管理控件的状态以及用于状态过渡的逻辑。

span.span: Manages states and the logic for transitioning between states for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使您能够指定控件，控件的外观的状态时处于某个特定状态，并当控件更改状态。The enables you to specify states for a control, the appearance of a control when it is in a certain state, and when a control changes states. 例如，时按下比不按下时可能遇到略有不同的外观。For example, a might have a slightly different appearance when it is pressed than when it is not pressed. 两个状态定义对应于按下它时 (`"Pressed"`) 并且它不是 (`"Normal"`)。Two states that the defines correspond to when it is pressed (`"Pressed"`) and when it is not (`"Normal"`). 控件中一种状态时的外观由。The appearance of a control when it is in a state is defined by a . A包含一套指定控件的外观时该控件处于该状态的更改的对象。A contains a collection of objects that specify how the control's appearance changes when the control is in that state. 通过设置，向控件添加可视状态`VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups`附加在控件上的属性。You add visual states to a control by setting the `VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups` attached property on the control. 每个包含一套是互斥的对象。Each contains a collection of objects that are mutually exclusive. 也就是说，控件将始终在恰好一个在每个状态中。That is, the control is always in exactly one state of in each . 还可以指定控件在进入特定状态。The also enables you to specify when a control enters a specific state. 若要更改状态而应调用的方法取决于你的方案。The method that you should call to change states depends on your scenario. 如果你创建使用的控件中其，调用方法。If you create a control that uses the in its , call the method. 对于详细了解如何创建控件使用，请参阅[创建控件，其可自定义外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For more information about how to create controls that use the , see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). 如果你使用之外(例如，如果你使用中或单个元素中)，调用方法。If you use the outside of a (for example, if you use a in a or in a single element), call the method. 在任一情况下，执行需要相应地启动和停止了与所涉及的状态将情节提要的逻辑。In either case, the performs the logic that is required to appropriately start and stop the storyboards that are associated with the involved state. 例如，假设一个定义的状态，`State1`和`State2`，其中每个有与之关联的情节提要。For example, suppose that a control defines the states, `State1` and `State2`, each of which has a storyboard associated with it. 如果控件处于`State1`且所传递`State2`到或、在启动情节提要`State2`并停止在情节提要`State1`。If the control is in `State1` and you pass `State2` to or , the starts the storyboard in `State2` and stops the storyboard in `State1`. 附带的控件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用更改可视状态。Controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] use the to change visual states. 当你创建的控件，附带[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，你可以添加到控件的对象处于某个特定状态指定控件的外观。When you create a for a control that is included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], you can add objects to the control's to specify the control's appearance in a certain state. 若要查找包含的控件的可视状态的名称[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，请参阅[控件样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md)。To find the names of the visual states for the controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], see [Control Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md). 过渡状态，因此不需要执行任何操作以外的控件的逻辑句柄定义中新的对象。The control's logic handles transitioning between states, so you do not need to do anything other than define the objects in the new . 有关如何创建现有控件的控件模板的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about how to create control templates for existing controls, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 如果你想要实现您自己的逻辑状态之间转换，则必须从，重写方法，并设置附加上使用的自定义逻辑的控件的属性。If you want to implement your own logic for transitioning between states, you must inherit from , override the method, and set the attached property on the control that uses the custom logic. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并添加名为`CommonStates`到`VisualStateManager.VisualStatesGroups`附加属性。The following example creates a and adds a named `CommonStates` to the `VisualStateManager.VisualStatesGroups` attached property. 该示例定义了`MouseOver`和`Normal`中的对象`CommonStates` 。The example defines the `MouseOver` and `Normal` objects in the `CommonStates`. 当用户将鼠标指针移，它将从红色变为绿色转移半秒。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the , it changes from red to green over one half second. 当用户移动鼠标离开矩形，立即更改回红色。When the user moves the mouse away from the rectangle, the immediately changes back to red. 请注意，`Normal`状态不会定义。Note that the `Normal` state does not define a . A因为不需要时从托管代码转换`MouseOver`状态`Normal`状态，为`MouseOver`停止和属性返回为红色。A is not required because when the transitions from the `MouseOver` state to the `Normal` state, the for `MouseOver` is stopped and the property for the returns to red. [!code-xaml[VSMCustomControl#VSMNoTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml#vsmnotemplate)] 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序中的前面的示例和调用定义状态间转换的方法。The following example shows the event handler that is defined in the previous example and calls the method to transition between states. 在前面的示例的矩形是否是的一部分，该示例将不得不调用方法。If the rectangle in the previous example was part of a , the example would have to call the method. [!code-csharp[VSMCustomControl#GoToElementState](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#gotoelementstate)] [!code-vb[VSMCustomControl#GoToElementState](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gotoelementstate)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的外部元素的方法，以更改状态(例如，如果你使用中或)。Call the method to change states on an element outside of a (for example, if you use a in a or ). 调用方法如果您更改中使用的控件状态中其。Call the method if you are changing states in a control that uses the in its . ## Examples 下面的示例创建的应用程序会提示用户进行猜测介于 1 和 100 之间的数字。The following example creates an application that prompts the user to guess a number between 1 and 100. 当用户输入一个数字时，该应用程序指示猜测是否过高，太低，或正确。When the user enters a number, the application indicates whether the guess is too high, too low, or correct. 以下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]新建应用程序的用户界面，并定义 4 种状态： `TooLow`， `TooHigh`， `Correct`，和`Guessing`。The following [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] creates the user interface for the application and defines 4 states: `TooLow`, `TooHigh`, `Correct`, and `Guessing`. 当应用程序开始时，它是在`Guessing`状态。When the application begins, it is in the `Guessing` state. .. [!code-xaml[VSMGoToElementState#GoToElementStateXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmgotoelementstate/csharp/mainwindow.xaml#gotoelementstatexaml)] 下面的代码演示应用程序的逻辑。The following code shows the logic of the application. 在应用程序时用户输入一个数字，并单击按钮时，调用转换到`TooHigh`， `TooLow`，或`Correct`以向用户猜测提供反馈。When the user enters a number and clicks the button, the application calls to transition to `TooHigh`, `TooLow`, or `Correct` to provide feedback to the user about the guess. 若要试用该示例，请调用`GenerateNumber`应用程序开始时的方法。To try this example, call the `GenerateNumber` method when the application begins. [!code-csharp[VSMGoToElementState#GoToElementStateCode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmgotoelementstate/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#gotoelementstatecode)] [!code-vb[VSMGoToElementState#GoToElementStateCode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmgotoelementstate/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#gotoelementstatecode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行所需相应地启动和停止与转换相关联的演示图板的逻辑。The method performs the logic necessary to appropriately start and stop the storyboards that are associated with a transition. 当控件调用以更改其状态，执行下列任务：When a control calls to change its state, the does the following: - 首先，如果控件正在过渡到具有，情节提要开始。First, if the that the control is transitioning to has a , the storyboard begins. 然后，如果来自控件具有，情节提要结束。Then, if the that the control is coming from has a , the storyboard ends. - 如果控件已处于`stateName`状态，不执行任何操作并返回`true`。If the control is already in the `stateName` state, takes no action and returns `true`. - 如果`stateName`中不存在的`control`，不执行任何操作并返回`false`。If `stateName` does not exist in the of `control`, takes no action and returns `false`. 你可以实现你自己提供不同逻辑状态之间转换。You can implement your own to provide different logic for transitioning between states. 例如，您可以更改前面所述的逻辑，也可以提供自定义动画类型之间转换的逻辑。For example, you can change the logic described previously, or you can provide logic to transition between custom animation types. 若要实现，创建一个继承自的类，并重写方法。To implement a , create a class that inherits from and override the method. 若要使用自定义类，设置到自定义类型的对象的属性。To use the custom class, set the property to an object of your custom type.
